text: "Saved by the Bell" cast members have been implicated in a major Hollywood scandal, jeopardizing the show's comeback.

Ozzy Osbourne is back and guest starring on a new Post Malone song. The track, "Take What You Want," is off Malone's "Hollywood's Bleeding" album and also features rapper Travis Scott.

Exposure to the enormous cloud of toxins, dust and debris that resulted from the terrorist attack on the World Trade Center in 2001 has been linked to an increased risk of cardiovascular disease among first-responder firefighters, according to a new study.

Australian journalist Peter Lalor typically won't pay more than $10 for a pint. He was accidentally charged more than $67,000 for a beer at a hotel bar in Manchester, England.

The attorneys general of eight states and the District of Columbia are launching an antitrust investigation into Facebook, New York Attorney General Letitia James announced Friday.
